articles.title: Gold Medalists Feted in DPRK
articles.content:
Gold Medalists Feted in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Cabinet gave a reception at Okryu Restaurant on Saturday in honor of players who proved successful at the Fifth Asian Gymnastics Championship and the 2012 Asian Youth and Juvenile Weightlifting Championship.
					Present there were Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol, Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, officials concerned, players and coaches.
					
					The vice-premier in his speech warmly congratulated the players and coaches who bagged gold medals in the above-said championships.
					
					He called on them to fulfill the role of pioneers in making the hot wind of sports sweep the country.
					
					On behalf of the players Ri Se Gwang in his reply resolved to demonstrate the honor of Songun Korea with gold medals by applying the requirements of ideological campaign, fighting spirit, speed campaign and high technique in training and matches.
